::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(readr)
got_marriages <- read_csv("posts/_data/got/got_marriages.csv")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error: 'posts/_data/got/got_marriages.csv' does not exist in current working directory ('C:/Users/91955/Desktop/Social_Networks_Spring_23/posts').
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
head(got_marriages)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in head(got_marriages): object 'got_marriages' not found
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(igraph)
```

```{.r .cell-code}
network.ig <- graph_from_data_frame(got_marriages, directed = TRUE)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in as.data.frame(d): object 'got_marriages' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# Check if the network is directed or undirected, weighted or unweighted, unimodal or bipartite
is_bipartite(network.ig)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in "igraph" %in% class(graph): object 'network.ig' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
is_weighted(network.ig) 
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in "igraph" %in% class(graph): object 'network.ig' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
is_directed(network.ig) 
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error}
```
Error in "igraph" %in% class(graph): object 'network.ig' not found
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(network.ig)
```
